lead.p: toString â€” Returns a string representation of the specified Number object.

parameters.parameter: A numeric value between 2 and 36 specifying the representation.

example.heading: toString example
toString example
example.code: var n = new Number(100); console.log(n.toString(2)); // 1100100 (Binary representation) console.log(n.toString(8)); // 144 (Octal representation) console.log(n.toString(16)); // 64 (Hexadecimal representation)
